Kayako - ticket id 60242814 // Carlos Encalada commented publicly: Dear Michael,

Thank you for your patience, and I apologize for the delay in providing a clear answer to your question.

Yes — it is possible to port your fax numbers away from FaxMaker Online to your new carrier when you transition to Zoom Phone in early summer 2026, provided that these numbers were originally ported into FaxMaker Online by your organization. Since you mentioned that these were numbers you ported in during your initial setup, they are eligible to be ported out.

HOW THE PORT-OUT PROCESS WORKS

Port-outs from FaxMaker Online are always initiated by your new carrier. In your case, Zoom (or their underlying carrier) will need to submit the port request to move the numbers away from FaxMaker Online.

They will require:

	*
Your organization details

	*
Your account information

	*
The same information you originally provided in your Letter of Authorization (LOA) when porting the numbers into FaxMaker Online

You can also find this information in your GFI Accounts Portal under your account profile, in case you no longer have the original LOA.

Once Zoom submits the request, the port-out process typically takes a couple of weeks to complete. Your new carrier will keep you informed throughout the process.

FEES

There is no fee from GFI/FaxMaker Online to port your numbers out. Any porting-related charges—if applicable—would come from your new carrier, not from GFI.

If you have additional questions, you can refer to our article: Porting Fax Numbers to Another Carrier from FaxMaker Online [https://support.faxmakeronline.gfi.com/article/112151-porting-fax-numbers-to-another-carrier-from-faxmaker-online].

Best regards,
Carlos Encalada
GFI - FaxMaker Online Support Team

This ticket will stay open for one week unless you reply with "This ticket can be closed" or update the status to Completed in the portal. We will write to you again to remind you.

Kayako - ticket id 60242814 // Carlos Encalada commented privately:  :: Info ::

See https://support.faxmakeronline.gfi.com/article/112151-porting-fax-numbers-to-another-carrier-from-faxmaker-online

Porting Fax Numbers to Another Carrier from FaxMaker Online 

 You need to contact the new carrier you would like to use the fax number(s) with and request that the carrier ports the number away from FaxMaker Online, providing your account information and details of your organization which you can obtain from your original Letters of Authorization (LOA) which you must have filled when the numbers were ported to FaxMaker Online. The same information is also available in your GFI Accounts Portal [https://accounts.gfi.com/Signin] profile for your account.
